channel.title: "javac is not recognized as an external command"
channel.description: ok, this is what i've done so far... I have jdk 6u6 and jre 6u6....now, what my trouble is..when i go to system variables, Where i do my classpath and path etc...I need someone to explain to me how to do that. also when i name it, is it supposed to be like PATH CLASSPATH or path and classpath...capital or not? I do appreciate all of the help i can get. Thanks

item.title: "javac is not recognized as an external command"
item.dc:creator: @jamesbrooks jamesbrooks
item.description:
@jamesbrooks wrote:

CLASSPATH

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

PATH

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin

Read full topic

item.title: "javac is not recognized as an external command"
item.dc:creator: @i_lured_i i lured i
item.description:
@i_lured_i wrote:

Click my computer then…Open the

Local Disk (C:) < Program Files < Java < (Click on your java you have in there) < Bin

Then copy whats in the adress bar and use that for your “path”.

Hope this helped.

Read full topic
